description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              ***JOB DESCRIPTION
              
              - Responsible for supporting Branch General Manager with management of the Branch Operations.
              
              Carry out supervisory responsibilities in accordance with Bank policies, procedures and regulatory guidelines.
              
              - Develop new business relationships, expand and retain existing ones.
              
              - Conduct business calls to existing and potential customers.
              
              - Develop and manage sales process within the Branch office.
              
              - Cultivate and retain a staff that is customer focused and accountable for individual performance.
              
              - Develop, train, coach and mentor staff.
              
              - Approve transactions, authorizations, exceptions and adjustments.
              
              - Give our customers value by exhibiting excellence at all levels through accurate and efficient service and operational performance.
              
              - Assure that Branch records, reports and operations are accurate and timely.
              
              - Other tasks will be assigned by Branch General Manager.
              

              ***BENEFIT
              
              - Working from Monday to Friday
              
              - Salary: Negotiate
              
              - Bonus: 300% of basic salary
              
              - Social insurance; health insurance & unemployment insurance will be paid according to Vietnam Labor Law.
              
              - PTI Health insurance for all employees every year.
              
              - Supporting the daily pick-up car.
              
              - Every year, there are travel programs and training programs in Korea for excellent employees.
              
              - Professional working environment, development and promotion opportunities.
              
              - Annual salary increase policy.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              ***REQUIREMENTS
              
              - More than 5 years’ branch banking experience with more than 2 years in branch management.
              
              - Strong knowledge of bank products and services.
              
              - Fluent in Korean or English.
              
              - Ability to build customer relationships.
              
              - Be willing to participate in community and professional activities and organizations to expand personal network of business contacts for new business development.
              
              - Outstanding verbal and written communication skills.
              
              - Sincere desire to provide excellent customer service both internally and externally.
              
              - Excellent computer skills; knowledge of bank operating systems, a bonus.
              
              - Ability to successfully motivate and manage staff.
              
              - Possess strong analytical and problem solving skills.
              

              ***OTHER REQUIREMENT
              
              - Working place:
              
              Wooribank Vietnam, Ha Nam Branch at Le Hoan Street, Thanh Chau Ward, Phu Ly City, Ha Nam Province.
              
              - CV in English or Korean.
              
              - CV with portrait (do not use selfie photos or not suitable photos).
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
